sentence: • Rudolph 11/4 • Derek Carr (Las Vegas) 7/1 • Jimmy Garoppolo (San Francisco) 15/2 • Jameis Winston (New Orleans) 9/1 • Kenny Pickett (Pitt) 9/1 • Haskins 10/1 A pair of other veterans, Kirk Cousins and Ryan Fitzpatrick, are next at 11/1.
author: Tim Benz
title: Tim Benz: Mike Tomlin says 'all options are on the table' for a new quarterback. Let's hope he means it

sentence: However, Schobert currently stands as the team’s fifth-highest paid player behind T.J. Watt, Cameron Heyward, Stephon Tuitt and Minkah Fitzpatrick.
author: DJ Siddiqi
title: Steelers ‘Must Consider Cutting’ Ex-Pro Bowl Linebacker

sentence: There's likely to be at least one team that talks itself into taking a signal-caller in the top 10, but it would be surprising to see any of them be a huge upgrade over Taylor Heinicke or Ryan Fitzpatrick in Year 1.
author: Alex Ballentine
title: Raiders' Top Hypothetical Trade Packages for Derek Carr

sentence: Perry isn’t going to be the next Ryan Fitzpatrick but he does have a skill set that could make him useful.

title: Raiders Visit With Star Two-Sport Ivy League QB: ‘Here’s a Fun One’
